reviewText: Yes I will admit I bought this movie only because it features Kelly Brook!  I read the description and thought I might possibly enjoy the movie for it's other merits.  I'm usually a fan of action, adventure, thriller type movies and about 10 minutes into this movie I realized I was watching a Euro Chick flick.  It was not quite as shallow as most American chick flicks but almost.Okay. I have to admit I was expecting/hoping to see Kelly in some sexy clothes and maybe a bikini or even a nude scene. There was none of the above.You might like this movie if you want to watch a chick flick.If you are fan of Kelly Brook you should check out Survival Island.Survival IslandIt's an adventure movie and Kelly is in a bikini showing off her nice legs and everything else for the entire film.-
summary: As a fan of Kelly Brook I'm sorry to report...
Title: School for Seduction

reviewText: After watching the Ballykissangel Series, I became a fan of Dervla Kirwan and purchased this movie solely for the purpose of seeing her in a role other than Assumpta Fitzgerald.  She is an accomplished actress with a great range, and I would like to see much more of her; however, in the US, it is difficult to find her work.Overall, this is a fun movie, probably a PG13, but not offensive.
Title: School for Seduction

reviewText: I got this because Kelly Brook was in it, I have her "survival island" movie not bad at all and she shows off her sexy breast and ass in that movie, I though I would at least see as much, exspecially with the name of the movie as it was. but it sucked, no skin, a boring story line, and I will be trading this title in asap. I would like to have my money, and time back for even watching this stupid flick
Title: School for Seduction

reviewText: This is the BEST movie for learning about seduction (smile).  It was hard to understand what the characters were saying a few times.  Because of the accent if they spoke too quickly or mumbled, you had no clue what they said.  BUT the story line is just precious and watching the women (and one guy) change and evolve over the course of the movie was fun.  Some really hysterical parts, too.  I caught this movie on one of those pay movie clubs (netf**x) and liked it enough to order the DVD to watch over and again.  It is a very feel-good movie!
Title: School for Seduction

reviewText: I first found this movie while working at a video store, and was bowled over by it's charms. The gorgeous Kelly Brook stars as an Italian seductress who arrives in Newcastle, England to open a 'School of Seduction' for lonely women who want to please a man, and soon she receives more than she bargained for with women from different backgrounds, each having issues with their love lives. The premise, while not original, is well directed by Sue Heel, with excellent performances from the female cast, including Dervla Kirwan as Claire. She's the highlight of the movie for me, living with a boorishly sexist husband who's only love is his Alfa Romeo Spyder. Sometimes the thick English accents are hard to understand (no subtitles are available)..but the humor is well played (including one hilarious scene in the fish and chip shop to the strains of Nat King Cole)..definitely a charmer.
summary: School for Seduction: Will seduce you with it's charms..
Title: School for Seduction

reviewerName: The Movie Guy "Movies from A to Z"
reviewText: This is a movie for women. If you are expecting a teenage sex comedy romp with gratuitous nudity, this is not your film.Kelly Brook sporting a bad Italian accent-yes? comes to Newcastle and opens up a school for seduction. It is in part a confidence school for the women, who try what they learn in class at home, but without the kind of results that they hoped for. The results border on comedy and tragedy as the women come to terms that the problems in their life have nothing to do with their ability to seduce. For the guys you might want to check out Kelly Brook stroking a broom handle. There is no full frontal female nudity, just male from behind nudity.The frequent use of boring Italian music soundtrack was too much to endure. The movie is not hilarious or brilliant. The cockney accents were so thick, that at times I had difficulty understanding the dialogue, for what it was worth. Gals, do your guy a favor and don't make him watch this movie as all men are stupid and self-centered (so what else is new?).
Title: School for Seduction
